Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Lesbian \Les"bi*an\ (l[e^]z"b[i^]*an), a. 1. Of or pertaining to the island anciently called Lesbos, now Mitylene, in the Grecian Archipelago. [1913 Webster]
2. Amatory; erotic; -- in allusion to the reputed sensuality of the Lesbian people and literature; as, Lesbian novels. [archaic] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
3. homosexual; -- applied to female homosexuals. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Lesbian \Les"bi*an\ (l[e^]z"b[i^]*an), n. a female homosexual.
Syn: dyke[vulgar, deprecatory]. [PJC]
lesbian adj : of female homosexuality [syn: {sapphic}] n 1: a female homosexual [syn: {tribade}, {gay woman}] 2: a resident of Lesbos
